vsParam:
Do you have a moment now? Our investigation on the other day
confirmed that a dangerous monster lurks on the mountain.

Hmm, dangerous monster on the mountain!?
Oh, this sounds terrible...

Uh. And it seems that the monster comes down
the mountain regularly for food.

Before we strike it down,
please try not to leave the Academy.

Ah, let's just go kill it!
We can set off soon if we start preparing now!

Wh-what are you... talking about?
This monster is very different from the ones you killed!

If it's so dangerous,
we should eliminate it as soon as possible, right?

Hmm, after all, no one could guarantee that this monster
wouldn't come close to the Academy before you get ready.

You've got a point... But you are still students.
Why should you take such a big risk?
Because we want to protect our "comrades"!
We just want to do things in our power!

Yes, [px]'s right!
Would there be any other reasons?

But we want to protect our "partners".
So, we must take on things we are capable of!

... Hmm, I'd be too hidebound if I still stop you, huh?
And you wouldn't listen, would you?

Hmm. You begin to
understand us!

I recognize your strengths...
But I'm still worried.

That monster's capabilities remain unknown to us.
You do understand the great risks it involves, right?

Then you should come with us.
When you're around, we'd be more confident!

You and us together,
no monster is our match!
... Pulling that on me, huh? Fine.

I guess I have to go with you.
I swear on this sword that I will protect you.

OK, then it's settled.
We must kill that monster for our "partners"!

Ah ah, something's coming from the other side of the
mountain! It must be that dangerous monster!?

Er. Please be very careful!
We didn't battle with it during our investigation!

Got it!
To protect our "partners"... Guys, let's go!

We made it... It's down!
We struck it down, Sterk!

I didn't expect that we could actually kill it...
You guys really have become stronger.
We couldn't have killed it without you, Sterk!
It feels good that we've protected our "comrades"!

Hehe. I don't think you becoming stronger has anything to do
with me... But I'd be very honored if I truly helped you.

Yeah.
I deeply admire your faith.

Your spirit of fighting the monster to protect others...
is quite similar to chivalry.

Perhaps... for a knight,
the most important thing isn't being needed by others.

It's the will of
"wanting to protect someone".

You want to protect your "partners",
while I want to protect...

Ah, look look!
The fruit over there looks so delicious!

H-hold on!
This is a very rare plant!

Don't rush to eat it.
Let me take it back and study it first!

Hey, you guys! Where are you going!? Although we have
killed the monster, we don't know if this place is safe or not...

Hurry up, Sterk!
Otherwise we'll finish all the fruits!

Hee hee, I got it â™ª
Ah!? It's broken...

Ah ah ah, you spilled the juice on my wings!
Sorel, you moron!!

Hmm... If I don't watch you closely,
who knows what dangerous things you'll do.

Hehe... In this sense,
you still need someone to protect you.
